languages.text: "Разве для тебя, элантах, весь твой мир сосредоточился в этой крохотной металлической клетке? Твой корабль, эти покои — песчинка. Островок. Временное пристанище в мире, что куда больше и шире, чем... впрочем, довольно об этом. Раз мы встретились, то я хочу поговорить с тобой... о нашем договоре".

"But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."
languages.original_text: "Разве для тебя, элантах, весь твой мир сосредоточился в этой крохотной металлической клетке? Твой корабль, эти покои — песчинка. Островок. Временное пристанище в мире, что куда больше и шире, чем... впрочем, довольно об этом. Раз мы встретились, то я хочу поговорить с тобой... о нашем договоре".

traits.locale_text: "But is your entire world contained inside this tiny iron cage? Your ship, these chambers — a speckle of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is much bigger and expansive than... enough of that, however. Since we've met, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

A temporary shelter in a world that is much bigger and expansive than... enough of that, however. Since we've met, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “可是，外界人，你的整个世界难道就只局限于这个小小的金属笼子吗？你的飞船，所有这些房间，不过是一粒尘埃，一座孤岛，一个临时避难所，漂浮在这个苍茫浩瀚的……好了，不说了。既然你来了，对于我们的约定……我有话要说。”
languages.original_text: "But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

traits.locale_text: “可是，外界人，你的整个世界难道就只局限于这个小小的金属笼子吗？你的飞船，所有这些房间，不过是一粒尘埃，一座孤岛，一个临时避难所，漂浮在这个苍茫浩瀚的……好了，不说了。既然你来了，对于我们的约定……我有话要说。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¿Pero está todo tu mundo confinado en esta diminuta caja de metal, elantach? Tu nave, esta estancia, no son más que motas de polvo. Una isla. Un refugio provisional en un mundo mucho más amplio y extenso que... Bueno, dejémoslo. Ahora que estás aquí, deseo hablar contigo... sobre nuestro acuerdo».
languages.original_text: "But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

traits.locale_text: «¿Pero está todo tu mundo confinado en esta diminuta caja de metal, elantach? Tu nave, esta estancia, no son más que motas de polvo. Una isla. Un refugio provisional en un mundo mucho más amplio y extenso que... Bueno, dejémoslo. Ahora que estás aquí, deseo hablar contigo... sobre nuestro acuerdo».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « L'entièreté de votre monde tient-elle dans cette minuscule cage de métal, elantach ? Votre vaisseau, ces appartements... ne sont rien que des grains de poussière. Une île. Un abri temporaire dans un univers bien plus grand et... Je vais m'arrêter là. Puisque vous êtes ici... je voudrais vous reparler de notre marché. »
languages.original_text: "But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

traits.locale_text: « L'entièreté de votre monde tient-elle dans cette minuscule cage de métal, elantach ? Votre vaisseau, ces appartements... ne sont rien que des grains de poussière. Une île. Un abri temporaire dans un univers bien plus grand et... Je vais m'arrêter là. Puisque vous êtes ici... je voudrais vous reparler de notre marché. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ist denn Eure ganze Welt in diesem winzigen Metallkäfig enthalten, Elantach? Euer Schiff, diese Quartiere – sie sind nicht mehr als ein Staubkorn. Eine Insel. Ein vorübergehender Unterschlupf in einer Welt, die viel größer und weiter ist als ... Aber lassen wir das. Ihr seid hier, und ich möchte mit Euch sprechen ... über unsere Vereinbarung."
languages.original_text: "But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

traits.locale_text: "Ist denn Eure ganze Welt in diesem winzigen Metallkäfig enthalten, Elantach? Euer Schiff, diese Quartiere – sie sind nicht mehr als ein Staubkorn. Eine Insel. Ein vorübergehender Unterschlupf in einer Welt, die viel größer und weiter ist als ... Aber lassen wir das. Ihr seid hier, und ich möchte mit Euch sprechen ... über unsere Vereinbarung."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「この小さな金属の檻の中にお前の世界のすべてが収まっているのか、エランタ？お前の船も、この部屋も…塵の一粒にすぎない。島だ。遥かに大きく広大な世界の一時的な避難所…もういいだろう。せっかくお前がここにいるのだから話がしたい…我々の協定について」
languages.original_text: "But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

traits.locale_text: 「この小さな金属の檻の中にお前の世界のすべてが収まっているのか、エランタ？お前の船も、この部屋も…塵の一粒にすぎない。島だ。遥かに大きく広大な世界の一時的な避難所…もういいだろう。せっかくお前がここにいるのだから話がしたい…我々の協定について」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Senin bütün dünyan, bu küçük demir kafes kadar mı elantach? Gemin, bu odalar... Hepsi bir toz zerresi. Bir ada. Çok daha engin ve büyük bir dünyadaki geçici bir sığınak... Neyse, bu kadar yeter. Madem gelebildin, seninle anlaşmamız hakkında konuşmak istiyordum."
languages.original_text: "But is your entire world contained within this tiny metal cage, elantach? Your ship, these chambers — they are but a speck of dust. An island. A temporary shelter in a world that is far bigger and more expansive than... Well, enough of that. Now that you are here, I wish to speak with you... about our agreement."

traits.locale_text: "Senin bütün dünyan bu küçük demir kafes kadar mı elantach? Gemin, bu odalar... Hepsi bir toz zerresi. Bir ada. Çok daha engin ve büyük bir dünyada, geçici bir sığınak... Neyse, bu kadar yeter. Burada olduğuna göre seninle anlaşmamız hakkında konuşmak istiyordum."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
